Articles.Content:
Parts: 42 Each

F-14 Unswept wings download

F-14 Swept wings download

How to install:

1. Download the .json file for the craft you want

2. Put the .json in C:\Users\<YOUR USER>\AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2\Workspaces

3. Open the VAB and load the craft!

 

Unfortunately there are no motor parts in KSP2 yet, so you have to launch each individually.

The unswept variant has a pretty large turning radius making it hard to control and the swept variant is even worse, but they do fly. It's hard to make a good plane with realistic proportions in KSP so I'm sacrificing performance for looks.
